Package game

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CurrentPlayer
    The CurrentPlayer class stores the score of the player.
    Database
    The Database class stores all the game icons, except for the difficult game.
    DifficultGame
    The DifficultGame class represents the screen for the difficult level.
    EasyGame
    The EasyGame class is a screen that represents the Easy Level.
    Element
    The Element class represents a generic element with a name and location.
    GameParticle
    The GameParticle class represents the generic game element.
    GameWindow
    The GameWindow creates the window, and creates the level panel.
    KeyboardListener  
    LevelMap
    The LevelMap class represents the panel that updates and draws the game.
    LevelScreen  
    Location
    The Location class stores the x coordinates and y coordinates (location) of an element.
    MediumGame
    The MediumGame class represents the screen for the medium level.
    Obstacle
    The "Obstacle" class.
    PausePanel
    The PausePanel shows the pause screen when user wants to pause.
    Screen
    Represents a Screen, which can be created, updated and drawn.
    ScreenFactory
    The ScreenFactory is a class that can create, and set a Screen to show.
    SidePanel
    The SidePanel stores all the components of the side panel while the user is playing the game.
